title: Fish Market Ordering
description: Learn to order fish at Noryangjin Market. Practice colors and fish names in Korean.

scenario.context: You're at Korea's largest fish market and want to buy fresh fish. Practice identifying colors and fish names, then place your order in Korean.
scenario.culturalNote: In Korean markets, it's common to ask about freshness and negotiate prices. Vendors appreciate when foreigners try to speak Korean.

phases.title: Color Vocabulary
phases.description: Learn basic colors in Korean to describe what you want

phases.title: Fish Names
phases.description: Learn common fish names found at Korean markets

phases.title: Place Your Order
phases.description: Combine colors and fish names to place an order
phases.objective: Successfully order fish using Korean phrases
